title: Bug 11314Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: in the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in thepreferences (JavaWork in progress), com.ibm.foobar is replaced withco~.ib~.foobar.I believe that package name compression should only replace a fragment if thecompressed name is actually smaller.Thus com. would not be replaced in this example, since co~. is the same length,and contains less info.
